name: Dice Champions
description:
New here,looking for advices on improving motivation and game feedback/opinions

Hello, been checking itch.io in the previous years mostly to see other games and decided to try my luck at making a post asking for some advice/feedback on promoting my own mobile game.

Game's a turn/dice based game where you select your class and go on to defeat a series of enemies using spells/items.  The main inspiration for this was the World of Warcraft board game, never got the chance to play it cuz people always got scared of its size and rules :(

You set up your dice pool and gain different effects from spells that help you gain different benefits, they use keywords kinda like Hearthstone.

Leaving a link here to my game, Dice Champions .

Lately my motivation kinda died off once more, struggling to get it back, guess some feedback/opinions from random online people could help cuz until now I mostly received from friends.

Should I upload an ad free version on itch.io? Not familiar with how things work on itch.io besides the casual player-site visitor.
